snippet: The legislators crossed the Hudson to join the City Council speaker, Christine C. Quinn, to advocate for making 21 the minimum age for tobacco sales in New Jersey. Ms. Quinn has made a similar proposal for New York City.
abstract: The legislators crossed the Hudson to join the City Council speaker, Christine C. Quinn, to advocate for making 21 the minimum age for tobacco sales in New Jersey. Ms. Quinn has made a similar proposal for New York City.

headline.main: New Jersey Lawmakers Use Manhattan City Hall to Push Tobacco Plan
